text: @realDonaldTrump #NotMyPresident is such a sad pathetic narcissistic fool that he held a rally to tell his ignorant supporters why he couldn’t sip from a glass of water & why he couldn’t walk down a ramp... he then piled on to his pure stupidity with his mind numbing nonsense about COVID-19
